	we setup 2 DJ servers with some data on dc=com
	we enable replication for this suffix and initialize this replication
	in a test to check that changelog can handle multiple suffixes, we add a new suffix on both servers backends and configure replication for this new suffix.
	we modify an entry from one server on this new suffix and check the entry is available on second server and that changelog keeps up.
	we add 3 entries on 1st server under dc=com
